presentationText.title: Artur Assis Alves - Software Engineer
presentationText.text: As a dedicated Computer Engineering student, my passion lies in crafting innovative software systems that solve real-world problems. I strive to continually expand my technical skills while creating efficient, user-friendly solutions.

professionalExperience.description: Responsible for the design and architecture of a multi-platform Flutter/Dart application for productivity software. Employed various project management and development tools to ensure efficient workflow and high-quality code.

projects.name: LifeScheduler App Development
projects.description: Contributed to the development of LifeScheduler, a productivity app that is being built with Flutter/Dart. The application follows a layered architecture, includes Firebase for user authentication and data management, and was developed following the principles of Test-Driven Development (TDD).
responsibilities: Development of task system using Firebase Cloud Firestore Database
achievements: Implemented the authentication system using Firebase Authentication service
Implemented the task system using Firebase Cloud Firestore as database

Python.description: Used extensively in several projects for backend development, data engineering, and creating web applications. Proficient with libraries such as Django.

C.description: Used for a variety of complex projects including the creation of a compiler, a shell for Unix systems, and a unit testing library.

JavaScript.description: Used in various web application projects including portfolio creation and 3D scene building. Contact with libraries such as 3js.

Dart.description: Gained experience through a Flutter development bootcamp course, developing several applications.

Go.description: Used in the development of a causal tree data structure project under the guidance of an experienced engineer and during a distrubuted systems class.

Software Testing.description: Gained experience through a course on software testing using the TestLink tool.

C#.description: Used in a Unity game development course, developing multiple game concepts.

HTML.description: Used in various web application projects including portfolio creation, 3D scene building, and game development.

CSS.description: Used in various web application projects for styling and presentation.

Problem Solving.description: Applied problem-solving skills extensively in a range of complex software development projects.

Team Collaboration.description: Worked effectively within a team environment in several projects, including the causal tree data structure project.

Communication.description: Proficient in both English and Portuguese, and have developed strong written and verbal communication skills through my studies and projects.

achievements.title: My Portfolio
achievements.description: Web application project (Javascript, HTML, CSS) facilitating creation of user's formatted portfolio HTML page with data stored in JSON for easy updates, accommodating multiple resume versions, photo and social network integration, professional experiences, courses, papers, and more, offering multiple formatting themes and SEO optimizations.

achievements.title: MinerSUS - Data Engineering Project for loading SUS (Unified Health System) data to be used for breast cancer-related research
achievements.description: Design, implementation, and automation of an ELT (Extract, Load, and Transform) process for SUS data. For this task, a Python framework was developed which allows creating a pipeline with block architecture that processes the data in batches, automated with a task scheduler.

achievements.title: The Complete 2021 Flutter Development Bootcamp with Dart
achievements.description: Programming course in Flutter for creating applications with more than 23 hours of lessons, in which 13 applications were developed in flutter with the aim of practicing different aspects. The course presented fundamentals of Dart and Flutter, Firebase, communication with external APIs, basic concepts of stream, state management, etc. This course served as a starting point for my journey in Flutter.

achievements.title: Software Testing - Course on TestLink
achievements.description: Course on software testing using the TestLink tool. The course presents techniques for creating tests based on requirements, exploration testing, design strategy, planning and execution of tests, test reports, test automation, etc. As an exercise, a video was recorded demonstrating the process of design, planning and execution of tests for a project in use using TestLink.

achievements.title: Site Covid-19 — Website for a Software Engineering class project
achievements.description: The project is about a website used for visualization and storage of recent data from patients with COVID-19. The Django framework, in python, was used for the website backend. During the development, libs that allow data visualization and pdf generation were used.

achievements.title: ctest — Project of a unit test lib for C
achievements.description: A lib for unit testing in C was developed. The lib was inspired by the python’s lib unittest. It prints each test result legibly and clearly. During the work on this project, concepts about C and unit tests were worked on.

achievements.title: C-- — Project of a simplified C compiler
achievements.description: In group, the following components were developed: lexer, parser, semantic analyzer and intermediate code generator for a subset of the C language. The project was developed in C, with the support of the tools flex and bison. Concepts of compilers and of tools for generating lexers and parsers were worked during the project.

achievements.title: miniShell — Project of a basic shell for Unix systems
achievements.description: A basic shell for the Unix environment was developed during this project. It was implemented in C. Concepts about operating systems (system calls, processes, interprocess communication, etc), Unix environment, pipelines, and the operation of a shell were worked on during this project.

achievements.title: causalTree — Project of an API that is the implementation of a data structure called causal tree
achievements.description: Participation, with the orientation of an experienced engineer, on the project of implementation of a data structure named causal tree, a kind of conflict free replicated data type (CRDT). The implementation is being done in Go.

achievements.title: Unity Learning — Junior programmer course by Unity
achievements.description: Learning programming and software development using game development on Unity, that uses C#, as a background. Some games and concepts were developed during the course.

achievements.title: 3js-computer-graphics - A basic 3D scene
achievements.description: This is a basic 3D scene built during for a computer graphics class. The 3js lib and a 3D modeling software were used

achievements.title: Tangram - A basic tangram game build using html and JS
achievements.description: A basic tangram that allows the user to move the geometric figures to complete the game. It allows rotation too.
